mainBoard.name: Sarkhan, Fireblood
mainBoard.originalText:
+1: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
+1: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells.
−7: Create four 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

rulings.text: A "Dragon spell" refers only to a spell that has the Dragon subtype, regardless of its name. For example, Dragon's Hoard isn't a Dragon spell.
Because it's a loyalty ability, Sarkhan's second ability isn't a mana ability. It can be activated only any time you could cast a sorcery. It uses the stack and can be responded to.

foreignData.name: Feu du dragon
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, vous pouvez révéler une carte de dragon de votre main ou choisir un dragon que vous contrôlez.
Le Feu du dragon inflige 3 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker. Si vous avez révélé une carte de dragon ou choisi un dragon au moment où vous avez lancé ce sort, le Feu du dragon inflige un nombre de blessures égal à la force de cette carte ou de cette créature à la place.

foreignData.name: Drachenfeuer
foreignData.text:
Als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, kannst du eine Drache-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen oder einen Drachen, den du kontrollierst, bestimmen.
Das Drachenfeuer fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls du eine Drache-Karte offen vorgezeigt oder einen Drachen bestimmt hast, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch gewirkt hast, fügt das Drachenfeuer stattdessen Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Stärke jener Karte bzw. Kreatur zu.

foreignData.name: Fuoco del Drago
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, puoi rivelare una carta Drago dalla tua mano o scegliere un Drago che controlli.
Il Fuoco del Drago infligge 3 danni a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio. Se hai rivelato una carta Drago o hai scelto un Drago mentre hai lanciato questa magia, il Fuoco del Drago infligge invece danno pari alla forza di quella carta o creatura.

foreignData.name: ドラゴンの火
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、あなたの手札にあるドラゴン・カード１枚を公開するか、あなたがコントロールしているドラゴン１体を選んでもよい。
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーである１体を対象とする。ドラゴンの火はそれに３点のダメージを与える。この呪文を唱えるに際しあなたがドラゴン・カードを公開するかドラゴンを選んでいたなら、代わりにドラゴンの火は公開したカードや選んだクリーチャーのパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignData.name: Fuego del dragón
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, puedes mostrar una carta de Dragón de tu mano o elegir un Dragón que controlas.
El Fuego del dragón hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo. Si mostraste una carta de Dragón o elegiste un Dragón al lanzar este hechizo, en vez de eso, el Fuego del dragón hace una cantidad de daño igual a la fuerza de esa carta o criatura.

mainBoard.name: Dragon's Fire
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand or choose a Dragon you control.
Dragon's Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If you revealed a Dragon card or chose a Dragon as you cast this spell, Dragon's Fire deals damage equal to the power of that card or creature instead.

rulings.text: A Dragon card is a card with the creature type Dragon in its type line. Similarly, a creature on the battlefield is a Dragon if it has the Dragon creature type. A card that has "Dragon" in the name (such as Dragon's Fire) isn't a Dragon card unless it also has the Dragon creature type.

If you chose a Dragon you control, use that Dragon's power as Dragon's Fire resolves to determine how much damage is dealt. If the Dragon you chose is no longer on the battlefield as Dragon's Fire resolves, Dragon's Fire will deal damage equal to the power it had the last time it was on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Dragon Whelp
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: If the fourth (or more) time Dragon Whelp's ability is activated during the same turn happens to be during that turn's end step, the delayed triggered ability won't trigger until the beginning of the next turn's end step. You'll have to sacrifice Dragon Whelp at that time.

The first three times Dragon Whelp's ability is activated in a turn will do nothing other than give it +1/+0 until end of turn. Any subsequent activations will also cause its delayed triggered ability to trigger. That means if you activate Dragon Whelp's ability five times, for example, two different delayed triggered abilities will trigger at the beginning of the next end step and cause you to sacrifice Dragon Whelp.

If the fourth (or subsequent) time Dragon Whelp's ability is activated during the same turn is during that turn's end step, the delayed triggered ability won't trigger until the beginning of the next turn's end step. You'll have to sacrifice Dragon Whelp at that time.

There's no limit to the number of times you can activate Dragon Whelp's ability in a turn. However, the fourth activation in a turn and each subsequent activation will cause a delayed triggered ability that will force you to sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

mainBoard.name: Dragonlord's Servant
mainBoard.originalText: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: Dragonlord's Servant can't reduce the colored mana requirement of a Dragon spell you cast.
If there are any additional costs to cast a Dragon spell, apply those before applying Dragonlord's Servant and any other cost reductions.
The ability can apply to alternative costs to cast a Dragon spell.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
Dragonlord's Servant's ability can't reduce the amount of colored mana you pay for a spell. It reduces only the generic mana component of that spell.
Dragonlord's Servant's ability doesn't change the mana cost or mana value of any spell. It changes only the total cost you pay to cast Dragon spells.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Juegan lanzándose llamaradas los unos a los otros. No te ofendas si alguno te chamusca, solo está siendo cariñoso".
—Esfir, domadora de dragones rakdos
foreignData.name: Cachorro de engendro
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que el Cachorro de engendro ataque, hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura objetivo que controla el jugador defensor.

mainBoard.name: Hellkite Whelp
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever Hellkite Whelp attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.

rulings.text: If a creature attacks a planeswalker or battle, that permanent's controller is the defending player.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Hellkite Whelp's triggered ability can target only a creature controlled by the player it's attacking. It can't target a creature controlled by that player's teammate.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature defending player controls.

mainBoard.flavorText: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

foreignData.flavorText: Les habitants de Tarkir racontent une vieille légende, celle d'un homme-dragon nommé Sarkhan, le plus grand de tous les khans.
foreignData.name: Rage de Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Rage de Sarkhan inflige 5 blessures à n'importe quelle cible. Si vous ne contrôlez aucun dragon, la Rage de Sarkhan vous inflige 2 blessures.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Völker Tarkirs kennen eine alte Legende über einen Drachenmenschen namens Sarkhan, dem größten aller Khane.
foreignData.name: Sarkhans Zorn
foreignData.text: Sarkhans Zorn fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls du keinen Drachen kontrollierst, fügt dir Sarkhans Zorn 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli abitanti di Tarkir narrano di un'antica leggenda: un uomo-drago chiamato Sarkhan che era il più grande di tutti i khan.
foreignData.name: Furia di Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Furia di Sarkhan infligge 5 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio. Se non controlli Draghi, la Furia di Sarkhan ti infligge 2 danni.

foreignData.flavorText: タルキールの人々の間では、最も偉大なカンであった龍人のサルカンという者を太古の伝説として語り継いでいる。
foreignData.name: サルカンの怒り
foreignData.text: １つを対象とする。サルカンの怒りはそれに５点のダメージを与える。あなたがドラゴンをコントロールしていないなら、サルカンの怒りはあなたに２点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: En Tarkir se cuenta una antigua leyenda sobre un hombre dragón llamado Sarkhan, que fue el más grande de todos los kans.
foreignData.name: Furia de Sarkhan
foreignData.text: La Furia de Sarkhan hace 5 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo. Si no controlas ningún Dragón, la Furia de Sarkhan te hace 2 puntos de daño.

mainBoard.name: Sarkhan's Rage
mainBoard.originalText: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

rulings.text: Sarkhan's Rage checks whether you control a Dragon as it resolves.

mainBoard.text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.

mainBoard.flavorText: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

foreignData.flavorText: Les imbéciles pensent que la couvée de Kolaghan suit les orages. Les sages savent que c'est l'inverse.
foreignData.name: Dragon languefoudre
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand le Dragon languefoudre arrive, vous pouvez payer {2}{R}. Quand vous faites ainsi, il inflige 3 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText: Narren glauben, dass Kolaghans Brut den Blitzen folgt. Die Weisen wissen, dass es andersherum ist.
foreignData.name: Blitzmaul-Drache
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Blitzmaul-Drache ins Spiel kommt, kannst du {2}{R} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, fügt er einem Ziel deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli stolti sono convinti che la covata di Kolaghan segua le tempeste di fulmini. I saggi sanno che è piuttosto il contrario.
foreignData.name: Drago Sputafolgore
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando il Drago Sputafolgore entra, puoi pagare {2}{R}. Quando lo fai, infligge 3 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 愚か者はコラガンの血が嵐の後を追うと思い込んでいる。賢者はそれがまったくの逆だと知っている。
foreignData.name: 電光吠えのドラゴン
foreignData.text:
飛行
電光吠えのドラゴンが戦場に出たとき、{2}{R}を支払ってもよい。そうしたとき、１つを対象とする。これはそれに３点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドラゴン

foreignData.flavorText: Los necios creen que la estirpe de Kólagan acompaña a las tormentas eléctricas. Los sabios entienden que es al revés.
foreignData.name: Dragón lenguarrayos
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Dragón lenguarrayos entre, puedes pagar {2}{R}. Cuando lo hagas, hace 3 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Sparktongue Dragon
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

rulings.text: You don't choose a target for Sparktongue Dragon's last ability at the time it triggers. Rather, a second "reflexive" ability triggers when you pay {2}{R} this way. You choose a target for that ability as it goes on the stack. Each player may respond to this triggered ability as normal.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
When this creature enters, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Caverne oubliée
foreignData.text:
La Caverne oubliée arrive engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {R}.
Recyclage {R} ({R}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)

foreignData.name: Vergessene Höhle
foreignData.text:
Die Vergessene Höhle kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erzeuge {R}.
Umwandlung {R} ({R}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)

foreignData.name: Caverna Dimenticata
foreignData.text:
La Caverna Dimenticata entra TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {R}.
Ciclo {R} ({R}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)

foreignData.name: 忘れられた洞窟
foreignData.text:
忘れられた洞窟はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}を加える。
サイクリング{R}（{R},このカードを捨てる：カード１枚を引く。）

foreignData.name: Cueva olvidada
foreignData.text:
La Cueva olvidada entra girada.
{T}: Agrega {R}.
Ciclo {R}. ({R}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)

mainBoard.name: Forgotten Cave
mainBoard.originalText:
Forgotten Cave enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
